name: Ch14BBaseConvo5
_source: speak;Cormag;The night before a battle isn't usually when I find rest.|This time feels different, though.
speak;Joshua;Yeah...|There's something in the air tonight.
speak;Joshua;Like the winds are carrying whispers of what's to come.
speak;Cormag;You feel it too then.|I thought it might just be my own doubts.
speak;Cormag;Tomorrow we march on Grado Castle.|The place I once called home.
speak;Joshua;That can't be easy.|Fighting against your own kingdom.
speak;Cormag;My loyalty was never to stones and flags.|It was to the people inside them.
speak;Cormag;My brother Glen is still in there somewhere.|Following orders, believing he's doing what's right.
speak;Joshua;Family makes things complicated.|I haven't been back home to Jehanna in... quite some time.
speak;Joshua;But sometimes I get this feeling...|Like I should have returned sooner.
speak;Joshua;My mother.|We didn't part on the best terms.
speak;Cormag;I hope you get to set things right with her.|When this is all over.
speak;Joshua;That's just it.|I can't shake this feeling that time is running short.
speak;Joshua;Like something's slipping through my fingers before I even know what I've lost.
speak;Cormag;I know that feeling well.|Been having dreams about Glen lately.
speak;Cormag;I see him flying away on his wyvern.|Calling something back to me that I can't quite hear.
speak;Joshua;Call it a mercenary's instinct, but...|Tomorrow's going to change everything, isn't it?
speak;Cormag;I think so.|But we still have to face it, whatever comes.
speak;Cormag;For my brother's sake.|For Grado's sake.
speak;Joshua;For the people waiting for us.|Whether they know we're coming or not.
speak;Joshua;Care to make a wager on who strikes the first blow tomorrow?
speak;Cormag;Trying to lighten the mood with gambling?|I see your reputation is well-earned.
speak;Joshua;Hey, nothing wrong with a friendly bet.|Helps take the mind off darker thoughts.
speak;Cormag;Fair enough.|First blow struck, then.|What are the stakes?
speak;Joshua;Winner buys the other a drink.|When this is all over.
speak;Joshua;It gives us both something to look forward to.|A promise we have to keep.
speak;Cormag;Deal.|I'll hold you to that, Joshua.
speak;Joshua;I never welch on a bet.|It's bad luck.
speak;Joshua;And I have a feeling...|We're going to need all the luck we can get.
